name: Reviver
description:
Reviver is an exploration and crafting game about bringing magic back to a place that has lost it. Three artifacts have been scattered across the land. Find them and return them to the obelisk where they belong to bring magic back to the environment.

Reviver was made in one weekend at the USC Games chapter of Global Game Jam 2021. Its original soundtrack, beautiful pixel art, and simple crafting system complement the exploration-oriented area design. Although Reviver has some bugs and incompleteness, it demonstrates the ability of its development team to create a strong vertical slice in only one weekend.

Team: Camilo Quintero, Courtney Taylor, Dresden Kershaw, Janay Maisano, Kobi Saha
